name: part_004
file: tmp_【重大告知アリ＆3D LIVE】秘密結社holoX4周年 3DLIVE【#SSholoX4周年】 [Z_E5w_pYAck]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Laplus Darknesss performing 'Gimme x Gimme' on stage with laser effects.
Kazama Iroha performing 'Honto no Watashi' in a bamboo-themed stage setting.

subtitles.original: 最低んなったあの娘のほうがいいんだもんね
subtitles.english: You'd rather have that girl who hit rock bottom, huh?

subtitles.original: あたし興味ないよ キミなんて
subtitles.english: I'm not interested in you at all.

subtitles.original: マジ半端ないね
subtitles.english: You're seriously unbelievable.

subtitles.original: ダメダメね
subtitles.english: You're hopeless.

subtitles.original: Love Me Gimme Chuなこの愛に
subtitles.english: Love Me Gimme Chu, by this love...

subtitles.original: 壊されたい
subtitles.english: ...I want to be destroyed.

subtitles.original: Ah 壊されたい
subtitles.english: Ah, I want to be destroyed.

subtitles.original: 止め処ないよキミの愛を独り占めしたい
subtitles.english: It's endless, I want to have your love all to myself.

subtitles.original: 毒だろうがなんだろうが抱きしめてあげたい
subtitles.english: Poison or whatever it is, I want to embrace it.

subtitles.original: ナンセンス契約 独占のFALLING LOVE
subtitles.english: Nonsense contract, a monopoly of falling love.

subtitles.original: 逃さない ずっと
subtitles.english: I won't let you get away, ever.

subtitles.original: キミが好きってその感情に
subtitles.english: That feeling that I like you...

subtitles.original: 騙されてる
subtitles.english: ...I'm being deceived by it.

subtitles.original: 大事な法はキミが確か
subtitles.english: The important rule is that you...

subtitles.original: 決めかねてる
subtitles.english: ...are hesitating to decide.

subtitles.original: バカすぎるキミへ
subtitles.english: To you, who are too stupid.

subtitles.original: あたし興味ないよ キミなんて
subtitles.english: I'm not interested in you at all.

subtitles.original: ただ振り回して好きなだけ
subtitles.english: I'm just stringing you along as much as I like.

subtitles.original: LOVEでDEEPなこの愛は
subtitles.english: This love that is love and deep...

subtitles.original: 渡さないから
subtitles.english: ...I won't hand it over.

subtitles.original: バカだよね 色ボケだね
subtitles.english: You're an idiot, blinded by lust.

subtitles.original: それ見たことか ザマァみろか
subtitles.english: Didn't I tell you? Serves you right.

subtitles.original: もう他でもない あなたに呪われたまま
subtitles.english: Cursed by none other than you.

subtitles.original: まぁ
subtitles.english: Well...

subtitles.original: いや興味ないよ キミなんて
subtitles.english: No, I'm not interested in you.

subtitles.original: バカなフリしてあげただけ
subtitles.english: I just pretended to be stupid for you.

subtitles.original: 愛と哀をぶつけ合って
subtitles.english: Clashing love and sorrow together...

subtitles.original: ぐちゃぐちゃになって
subtitles.english: ...it all becomes a mess.

subtitles.original: あたし興味ないよ キミなんて
subtitles.english: I'm not interested in you at all.

subtitles.original: マジ半端ないね ダメダメね
subtitles.english: You're seriously unbelievable. You're hopeless.

subtitles.original: Love Me Gimme Chuなこの愛に
subtitles.english: Love Me Gimme Chu, by this love...

subtitles.original: 壊されたい
subtitles.english: ...I want to be destroyed.

subtitles.original: Ah 壊されたい
subtitles.english: Ah, I want to be destroyed.

subtitles.original: Ah 壊されたい
subtitles.english: Ah, I want to be destroyed.

subtitles.original: 見た目だけじゃ分からない
subtitles.english: You can't understand just by appearances.

subtitles.original: 私のこと可愛いだけと
subtitles.english: That I am just cute...

subtitles.original: まさか思っていないよね
subtitles.english: ...you don't really think that, do you?

subtitles.original: 私のホント
subtitles.english: My true self...

subtitles.original: 知っていてほしい
subtitles.english: ...I want you to know it.

subtitles.original: 予測不可能な範囲で
subtitles.english: Within an unpredictable range,

subtitles.original: 不測の事態も動じない
subtitles.english: I'm unfazed even by unforeseen situations.

subtitles.original: ポーカーフェイスでいるけど
subtitles.english: I keep a poker face, but...

subtitles.original: 心は常に青白く燃える
subtitles.english: ...my heart is always burning pale blue.

subtitles.original: 諦めはしない 媚びたりもしない
subtitles.english: I won't give up, and I won't fawn.

subtitles.original: 私は負けない
subtitles.english: I won't lose.

subtitles.original: 扱いやすい奴だとなら
subtitles.english: If you assume I'm easy to handle...

subtitles.original: 甘く見ると痛い目見るよ
subtitles.english: ...you'll regret underestimating me.

subtitles.original: それでも時には逃げ出してしまいたい
subtitles.english: Even so, sometimes I just want to run away.

subtitles.original: そんな衝動に弱音吐き出す夜もある
subtitles.english: There are nights I vent my complaints from such impulses.

subtitles.original: ほんの小さな小さな妥協が
subtitles.english: Just a tiny, tiny compromise...

subtitles.original: 降り重なり重なって動けない
subtitles.english: ...piles up until I can't move.

subtitles.original: 大きな大きな可能性失くし
subtitles.english: Losing big, big possibilities...

subtitles.original: 未来を狭めてしまうから
subtitles.english: ...because it narrows down my future.

subtitles.original: どんなに暗くても辛くても
subtitles.english: No matter how dark or painful...

subtitles.original: 後悔だけはしない
subtitles.english: ...I won't regret anything.

subtitles.original: 生きてる意味は誰じゃなくて
subtitles.english: The meaning of life isn't 'who'...

subtitles.original: 生き方なんだ
subtitles.english: ...it's 'how to live'.

subtitles.original: 現実逃避 理想との距離を
subtitles.english: Even if I could shorten the distance...

subtitles.original: 縮められたとしても
subtitles.english: ...between escaping reality and my ideals,

subtitles.original: ポーカーフェイスでいるだけ
subtitles.english: I'll just keep a poker face.

subtitles.original: 何事もなかったかのように
subtitles.english: As if nothing happened.

subtitles.original: 立ち止まりはしない 後戻りもししない
subtitles.english: I won't stop, and I won't turn back.

subtitles.original: 夢も捨てない
subtitles.english: I won't throw away my dreams either.

subtitles.original: らしいとか
subtitles.english: Like 'that's like you'...
